00029 #include "DynamicCellModelLoader.hpp"
00030 #include "AbstractDynamicallyLoadableEntity.hpp"
00031 
00032 #include <dlfcn.h>  // For dealing with .so files
00033 
00034 #include "Exception.hpp"
00035 
00036 DynamicCellModelLoader::DynamicCellModelLoader(const std::string& rLoadableModulePath)
00037     : mLoadableModulePath(rLoadableModulePath)
00038 {
00039     // Open the .so file
00040     mpDynamicModule = dlopen(rLoadableModulePath.c_str(), RTLD_NOW);
00041     if (mpDynamicModule == NULL)
00042     {
00043         EXCEPTION("Unable to load .so file '" + rLoadableModulePath + "': " + dlerror());
00044     }
00045 
00046     // Find the cell creation function
00047     dlerror(); // Reset errors
00048     void* p_creation_function = dlsym(mpDynamicModule, "MakeCardiacCell");
00049     // Check it exists
00050     const char* p_error = dlerror();
00051     if (p_error)
00052     {
00053         EXCEPTION("Failed to load cell creation function from .so file '" + rLoadableModulePath
00054                   + "': " + p_error);
00055     }
00056     // Cast to the right type
00057     mpCreationFunction = reinterpret_cast<CellCreationFunctionType*>(p_creation_function);
00058 }
00059 
00060 DynamicCellModelLoader::~DynamicCellModelLoader()
00061 {
00062     if (mpDynamicModule)
00063     {
00064         dlclose(mpDynamicModule);
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 AbstractCardiacCellInterface* DynamicCellModelLoader::CreateCell(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> pSolver,
00069                                                         boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> pStimulus)
00070 {
00071     AbstractCardiacCellInterface* p_cell = (*mpCreationFunction)(pSolver, pStimulus);
00072 
00073     AbstractDynamicallyLoadableEntity* p_entity = dynamic_cast<AbstractDynamicallyLoadableEntity*>(p_cell);
00074 
00075     if (p_entity != NULL)
00076     {
00077         p_entity->SetLoader(this);
00078     }
00079     return p_cell;
00080 }
00081 
00082 const std::string DynamicCellModelLoader::GetLoadableModulePath() const
00083 {
00084     return mLoadableModulePath;
00085 }
